response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your life positively. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive exceptional value while allowing me to secure a fair return on my investment. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1250000}
